name: Guelph Independent Living - Home Help Program
comment:
Provides assistance with routine household activities to improve the quality of life for qualifying older adults and adults with physical disabilities * homemakers can assist with:

  • light housekeeping
  • shopping
  • meal preparation
  • laundry

Guelph Independent Living - Home Help Program

Provides assistance with routine household activities to improve the quality of life for qualifying older adults and adults with physical disabilities * homemakers can assist with:<br><br><ul><li>light housekeeping</li> <li>shopping</li> <li>meal preparation</li> <li>laundry</li></ul>

description_of_this:
Provides assistance with routine household activities to improve the quality of life for qualifying older adults and adults with physical disabilities * homemakers can assist with:

  • light housekeeping
  • shopping
  • meal preparation
  • laundry
